title: World Day against the Death Penalty 10 October (Ministry of Agriculture and Food of the ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Agriculture and Food of the Kingdom of Norway ) Today , 82 % of the world's states have introduced a moratorium on the death penalty or have abolished it. 'I'm pleased to see that the international trend is moving away
